about_the_game:
Introducing Love Quest: Los Angeles

An Immersive Romantic Adventure

Immerse yourself in a Unique experience

Designed to enhance your real-world interactions with women while exploring the intricacies of relationships.
Explore the World of Romance:


Discover Love Quest: Los Angeles, where you'll meet four intriguing characters: the romantic, the business-savvy, the rocker, and the enigmatic gold digger. Chat with lifelike characters, portrayed by talented actresses, for a fun and engaging gameplay experience.


Choose Your Path:

Become the protagonist of your romantic journey as you navigate a storyline woven with depth and emotion. Encounter four alluring women, each with distinct personalities. Your task? Choose the one who resonates with you. Engage in carefully crafted conversations during first and second dates, tactfully steering the relationship towards your desired outcome.

Guidance from Experts:

Receive invaluable insights from animated 3D characters, Cupid's angel, and the playful Devil, as you set out on your quest for love. Their guidance equips you with the tools to master the complexities of dating and ensure your success.



An Exclusive Adventure:

Tailored for adult male gamers, Love Quest: Los Angeles offers an unparalleled escapade. Walk in the shoes of a modern man seeking romance, sharpen your conversational prowess, and uncover the secrets of the female psyche against the backdrop of the vibrant city of Los Angeles.



Are You Ready to Begin?

Prepare for an extraordinary romantic odyssey with Love Quest: Los Angeles. Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted world of emotion, choice, and authentic connections. Experience the thrill of falling in love anew within the realm of this captivating adventure.

P.S. Embark on the ultimate romantic adventure with Love Quest: Los Angeles. Our dedicated team has meticulously curated every facet of this game to deliver an immersive world of love and excitement. With meaningful choices and carefully crafted storytelling, prepare to redefine your understanding of romance. Get ready to embrace the future of love!

name: Love Quest: Los Angeles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Connect with intriguing characters through thoughtfully chosen questions in Love Quest: LA. To win a girl's heart, you'll need to ask all questions correctly and eventually invite her on a second date. Can you unravel her desires and emotions to make her your girlfriend by the end of the game?
